exp.title: Management Consultant
description: By joining Monitor Deloitte's Strategy & Analytics team, I honed my technical skills and gained expertise in drawing insights and communicating complex data effectively
On the side, I discovered a passion for tech and product management, which was the first time since shifting my career away from investment banking that I found a pursuit that truly resonates with me

exp.title: Intensive Coding Bootcamp
description: To learn more about technology, I undertook a 16-week full-time full-stack coding bootcamp with Imperial College London
I completed various coding challenges, and built applications using the MERN stack
Iâ€™m continuing my learning journey by taking on projects personally, and at Deloitte

exp.title: UX Design Course
description: To learn more about how to design experiences that delight customers, I undertook a 6-month part-time UX Design course with Google
Content incl. UX Design Process (empathize, define, ideate), UX Research, Wireframing and Prototyping with Figma, user testing

exp.title: Product Development Bootcamp
description: To learn more about the end-to-end product lifecycle, from ideation through to commercialisation, I joined a 2-week full-time bootcamp w/ Market Gravity
The bootcamp helped me connect the dots on how to transform an idea into a fully-fledged product / service / proposition, complete with a commercial model, product roadmap, and much more

exp.title: Management Consultant
description: I wanted to explore management consulting as a potential new career path
I gained experience in digital strategy, business analysis, and product / proposition development
However, I felt a desire to enhance my technical skills beyond slide building and excel

exp.title: IBD Analyst
description: I received an offer to join an American Boutique Investment Bank as an IBD Analyst
Becoming a Banker had been a goal of mine since my early teenage years
I painfully had to turn down the offer due to an unexpected health complication
After making a full recovery, I set my sights on new goals

exp.title: M&A Analyst
description: After graduating from University, I rejoined RSM on their graduate scheme, as an M&A Analyst in the Corporate Finance PLC Advisory team
I worked on numerous deals, advising on carve-outs, non-core disposals, accelerated M&A, and antitrust driven disposals

exp.title: Bath University, BSc
description: I chose to join the Business Administration program at Bath University, which was ranked #1 for business in the UK
With two industrial placements and an academic exchange, I knew this program would equip me well for a career in the city
Having grown up in rural Wales, I was objectively unaware of how the corporate world worked - this degree helped me close that gap

exp.title: Bocconi, BSc Exchange
description: During my penultimate year, I studied at Bocconi Business School in Milan
I ate lots of pasta, drank lots of wine, and got to learn at one of the best business institutions
This experience sparked a passion for travel and nomadism that I still carry with me today

exp.title: Accenture CG&S Strategy
description: I was sponsored by Accenture CG&S to complete a research report on the emergence of the Gig Economy
The c. 200 page research report included a synthesis of over 20 interviews and 50 survey responses, and culminated in a series of managerial recommendations
